greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lodumo_5 of A102370 (sloping binary numbers) .
comment: The Lodumo_m transformation of a sequence s(n) is defined by a(n) = smallest nonnegative integer not yet in the list a(.) such that a(n)=s(n) (mod m). [From _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 30 2009]
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 28 2009
